articles.author: Sarah Wulf Hanson, University of Washington, Theo Vos, University of Washington, The Conversation
articles.title: Long COVID stemmed from mild cases of COVID-19 in most people, according to a new multicountry study - DC News Now | Washington, DC
articles.description: Even mild COVID-19 cases can have major and long-lasting effects on people’s health. That is one of the key findings from our recent multicountry study on long COVID-19 – or long COVID – recently published in the Journal of the American Medical Association.
